item.title: Opinion Poll by GPO for Star TV, 30 May–3 June 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Πλεύση Ελευθερίας (NI): 3–4 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by GPO for Star TV, 30 May–3 June 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions

item.description:

  • Κίνημα Αλλαγής (S&D): 12.3–16.6%
  • Νέα Δημοκρατία (EPP): 26.9–32.5%
